AND NVL(b.ORGNZT_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND NVL(a.USER_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'

SELECT COUNT(ORGNZT_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNORGNZTINFO WHERE 1=1
AND ORGNZT_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND ORGNZT_DC LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
SELECT ORGNZT_NM FROM COMTNORGNZTINFO WHERE ORGNZT_ID = #{orgnztId}
SELECT A.DEPT_ID, B.ORGNZT_NM DEPT_NM, A.DEPT_JOBBX_ID, A.DEPT_JOBBX_NM FROM COMTNDEPTJOBBX A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID ORDER BY B.ORGNZT_NM, A.INDICT_ORDR ASC

SELECT COUNT(DEPT_JOBBX_ID) as cnt FROM COMTNDEPTJOBBX A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNORGNZTINFO B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID WHERE 1=1
AND A.DEPT_ID = #{deptId}
AND NVL(B.ORGNZT_NM, ' ') LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
AND A.DEPT_JOBBX_NM LIKE '%'||#{searchWrd}||'%'
